text:
Providence, RI (full-time) or remote (part-time)

Care Thread provides secure mobile messaging and team-based collaboration solutions for healthcare providers in hospitals. Care Thread's mobile and web apps deliver real-time information detailing patient status and treatment to every member of the care team, addressing communication gaps to eliminate unnecessary costs and reduce medical errors.

Our products are built around a real-time messaging and notification framework, using tools including node.js, Python, CoffeeScript, RabbitMQ, and PostgreSQL.

We're looking to expand our team by adding web front-end developers, mobile developers, and back-end developers, as well as a system administrator who's comfortable with PostgreSQL databases, Amazon Virtual Private Cloud, and VPNs.

If you'd like to build the next generation of healthcare software, please contact us at jobs@carethread.com.
